cat.description: Print file contents or stdin if not file provided

curl.description: Fetch a file and prints its content

debug.description: Do nothing, just stay alive and prints its controller in the devtools so that the user can manually play with the process

gunzip.description: Decompress stdin as gzip and save it to output, or stdout if output not provided

gzip.description: Compress stdin as gzip and save it to output, or stdout if output not provided

ls.description: Prints directories content (use the current working directory if no argument provided)

rm.description: Delete a file or an empty directory (no recursive option)

fork_bomb.description: USE AT YOUR OWN RISKS! Starts a bounded fork bomb (spawn '2 ^ depth' process) - intended for performances measurement only

sleep.description: Spawn a process that sleep for the specified amount of time

tee.description: Redirects stdin every provided files and prints the stream content to stdout

cd.description: Change current directory to new_directory, or / if no directory provided
